## Extension.pasteRules() method

Register paste rules for this extension.

Paste rules are activated when text is pasted into the editor.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
pasteRules?(params: ExtensionManagerTypeParams<GType>): ProsemirrorPlugin[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | <code>ExtensionManagerTypeParams&lt;GType&gt;</code> | schema params with type included |

<b>Returns:</b>

`ProsemirrorPlugin[]`
